name: rexsn
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Restricted existential quantification over a singleton. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 5-Jan-2011.)
